data.eml:eml: A new species of eriophyoid mite (Acari: Eriophyoidea: Eriophyidae) on Leucadendron argenteum (L.) R. Br. from South Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pye, Daniel R. L. (2011): A new species of eriophyoid mite (Acari: Eriophyoidea: Eriophyidae) on Leucadendron argenteum (L.) R. Br. from South Africa. Zootaxa 3085: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.207837
